name: Outdoor Adventures With Marisa Kirisame
description:
This is a unofficial fangame of the Touhou Project series. It is permitted under the official guidelines. Please support the official releases, some of which are available on Steam!

FEATURES

  • Beautiful artwork with stunning backgrounds and scenes!
  • Easy going, casual visual novel gameplay!
  • Engaging, clever dialogue to keep you hooked on the story, complete with dialogue choices!!
  • Great ambient soundtrack!
  • Partial voice acting that brings Marisa to life in this game!

STORY

You're going on a little adventure with none other then Marisa Kirisame from the Touhou Project! You both have quite a few things in mind for the trip, but will things go as planned?
